Title: Deva Zan
Description: ['The Divine Warriors were defeated by the Darkness and vanished far into the space-time. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' In the world in chaos, a samurai ZAN realizes his mission and travels beyond the space-time to gather the scattered warriors. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' In order to beat the corps of the Darkness, ZAN tries to acquire the Dark Power...', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', Note:, ' While a minute long trailer was released, the feature length film was never produced.']
